# Adding interactions across attributes


data <- data.frame(
  price   = c(1, 2, 3),
  discount = c("80%", "50%", "25%"),
  brand   = c("hiland", "yoplait", "dannon")
)

dummyCode(data, c("discount", "brand"))

parNames   = c('price', 'feat', 'brand', 'discount*price', 'price*brand', 'discount*brand')
